data.description: This setting defines if retractions between support structures have to be limited.
data.hints:
- Enable this feature to reduce the number of retractions between supports, reducing the stress on the filament.
- Disable this feature to retract between all supports, reducing oozing and strengthening the support material.
data.notes: Be careful when disabling this setting if printing challenging support materials, like PVA. The stress on the material might cause clogging and material grinding.
